summary: This module implements a template-driven binary sensor platform for Home Assistant, defining configuration schemas and providing a class that creates virtual binary sensors whose on/off state is computed from user-defined templates referencing other entities, with support for device classes, icons, pictures, and state delay handling.
business_intent: Enable Home Assistant users to define custom binary sensors through templating, allowing flexible state logic and integration of virtual sensors into automations and dashboards without requiring physical hardware.
